title: Ep. 657 - Arrest Andrew Cuomo
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, new revelations shed more light on Andrew Cuomo’s disastrous decision to send infected COVID patients into nursing homes in New York. The scandal is even bigger than we thought. Also Five Headlines including Dave Ramsey getting himself into trouble by criticizing the stimulus bills, but does he have a point? And in our Daily Cancellation, we’ll discuss the backlash against a film critic who committed the sin of critiquing an actress. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
